## Repeated Measures ANOVA

### Descriptives
```{r, results='asis'}
for(x in params$descr) print(kable(x))
```

### Levene's Test for Homogeneity of Variances
```{r}
kable(params$levene)
```

### Welch Test
```{r}
kable(params$welch)
```

### Analysis of Variance Table
```{r}
kable(params$anova)
```

### Effect Sizes


```{r}
params$posthoc
```

```{r}
params$se
```
